statements: SELECT strategy_name, conversion_rate FROM affiliate_marketing_strategy;
SELECT * FROM affiliate_marketing_strategy WHERE revenue_generated > 10000;
SELECT strategy_name, test_start_date FROM affiliate_marketing_strategy ORDER BY test_end_date DESC;
SELECT strategy_id, revenue_generated FROM affiliate_marketing_strategy ORDER BY revenue_generated ASC;
SELECT * FROM affiliate_marketing_strategy WHERE test_start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND test_end_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM affiliate_marketing_strategy WHERE strategy_name = 'SEO'
SELECT strategy_name, conversion_rate FROM affiliate_marketing_strategy WHERE revenue_generated > 5000 ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC
SELECT AVG(conversion_rate) AS avg_conversion_rate, MAX(revenue_generated) AS max_revenue FROM affiliate_marketing_strategy
SELECT strategy_name, test_start_date, test_end_date FROM affiliate_marketing_strategy WHERE test_start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_name, conversion_rate, revenue_generated, test_start_date, test_end_date FROM affiliate_marketing_strategy ORDER BY test_start_date ASC, conversion_rate DESC
SELECT * FROM affiliate_marketers;
SELECT first_name, strategy FROM affiliate_marketers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, conversion_rate FROM affiliate_campaigns ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM affiliate_campaigns WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT affiliate_id, COUNT(campaign_id) AS total_campaigns FROM affiliate_campaigns GROUP BY affiliate_id;
SELECT * FROM affiliate_marketers WHERE first_name = 'John';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM affiliate_campaigns WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM affiliate_marketers WHERE strategy = 'SEO' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM affiliate_marketers UNION SELECT * FROM affiliate_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, conversion_rate FROM affiliate_campaigns WHERE campaign_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM affiliates
SELECT affiliate_name, conversion_rate FROM affiliates
SELECT strategy_name FROM strategies
SELECT affiliate_id, conversion_value FROM conversions
SELECT affiliate_name, strategy_name FROM affiliates, strategies WHERE affiliates.strategy_id = strategies.strategy_id
SELECT * FROM affiliates JOIN conversions ON affiliates.affiliate_id = conversions.affiliate_id

SELECT affiliate_name, strategy_name, conversion_value FROM affiliates INNER JOIN conversions ON affiliates.affiliate_id = conversions.affiliate_id INNER JOIN strategies ON affiliates.strategy_id = strategies.strategy_id
SELECT affiliate_id, affiliate_name, strategy_id, strategy_name, conversion_rate FROM affiliates INNER JOIN strategies ON affiliates.strategy_id = strategies.strategy_id
SELECT affiliate_name, strategy_name, conversion_value FROM affiliates JOIN conversions ON affiliates.affiliate_id = conversions.affiliate_id WHERE conversion_value > 100
SELECT affiliate_name, strategy_name, conversion_value FROM affiliates LEFT JOIN conversions ON affiliates.affiliate_id = conversions.affiliate_id WHERE conversions.affiliate_id IS NULL
SELECT * FROM strategies;
SELECT strategy_name, conversion_rate FROM strategies WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5;
SELECT test_name, start_date, end_date FROM tests ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT insight_description FROM insights WHERE result_id = 'acf75684-681e-4a78-af7d-53247ea248f4';
SELECT strategy_name, conversion_count, revenue_generated FROM strategies JOIN results ON strategies.strategy_id = results.strategy_id;
SELECT * FROM strategies ORDER BY strategy_name ASC;
SELECT strategy_name, conversion_rate FROM strategies WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5;
SELECT test_name, start_date, end_date FROM tests WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT strategy_name, conversion_rate, traffic_source FROM strategies WHERE traffic_source = 'Organic';
SELECT insight_description FROM insights WHERE insight_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM affiliates;
SELECT affiliate_name, website_url FROM affiliates WHERE affiliate_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY campaign_id DESC;
SELECT max(clicks), sum(conversions) FROM campaign_data WHERE campaign_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM experiments WHERE status = 'active' ORDER BY end_date ASC, experiment_id;
SELECT affiliate_name, website_url FROM affiliates;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, clicks, conversions FROM campaigns c JOIN campaign_data cd ON c.campaign_id = cd.campaign_id WHERE c.start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT e.experiment_name, ev.variant_name FROM experiments e JOIN test_variants ev ON e.experiment_id = ev.experiment_id WHERE e.status = 'active';
SELECT c.campaign_name, ev.variant_name, cd.clicks, cd.conversions FROM campaigns c JOIN campaign_data cd ON c.campaign_id = cd.campaign_id JOIN test_variants ev ON c.campaign_id = ev.experiment_id;
